# Help to Fit of a Parametric Distribution to Non-Censored or Censored Data ![](reference/figures/fitdistrplus_hex.png)

[![CRAN_Release_Badge](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version-ago/fitdistrplus)](https://cran.r-project.org/package=fitdistrplus)
[![CRAN
Downloads](https://cranlogs.r-pkg.org/badges/fitdistrplus)](https://cran.r-project.org/package=fitdistrplus)
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/lbbe-software/fitdistrplus/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/lbbe-software/fitdistrplus/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml)
[![License: GPL
v3](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-GPLv3-blue.svg)](https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0)
[![Project Status: Active – The project has reached a stable, usable
state and is being actively
developed.](https://www.repostatus.org/badges/latest/active.svg)](https://www.repostatus.org/#active)
[![SWH](https://archive.softwareheritage.org/badge/origin/https://github.com/lbbe-software/fitdistrplus/)](https://archive.softwareheritage.org/browse/origin/?origin_url=https://github.com/lbbe-software/fitdistrplus)

`fitdistrplus` extends the
[`fitdistr()`](https://rdrr.io/pkg/MASS/man/fitdistr.html) function (of
the `MASS` package) with several functions to help the fit of a
parametric distribution to non-censored or censored data. Censored data
may contain left censored, right censored and interval censored values,
with several lower and upper bounds. In addition to maximum likelihood
estimation (MLE), the package provides moment matching (MME), quantile
matching (QME) and maximum goodness-of-fit estimation (MGE) methods
(available only for non-censored data). Weighted versions of MLE, MME
and QME are available.

`fitdistrplus` allows to fit any probability distribution provided by
the user and not restricted to base R distributions (see
[`?Distributions`](https://rdrr.io/r/stats/Distributions.html)). We
strongly encourage users to visit the CRAN task view on
[Distributions](https://cran.r-project.org/view=Distributions) proposed
by Dutang, Kiener & Swihart (2024).

## The package

The stable version of `fitdistrplus` can be installed from CRAN using:

``` r
install.packages("fitdistrplus")
```

The development version of `fitdistrplus` can be installed from GitHub
(`remotes` needed):

``` r
if (!requireNamespace("remotes", quietly = TRUE))
   install.packages("remotes")
   
remotes::install_github("lbbe-software/fitdistrplus")
```

Finally load the package in your current R session with the following R
command:

``` r
require("fitdistrplus")
```

## Documentation

Four **vignettes** are attached to the `fitdistrplus` package. Two of
them are for beginners

- [Overview of the fitdistrplus
  package](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/articles/fitdistrplus_vignette.html)
- [Frequently Asked
  Questions](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/articles/FAQ.html)

The last two vignettes deal with advanced topics

- [Which optimization algorithm to
  choose?](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/articles/Optimalgo.html)
- [Starting values used in
  fitdistrplus](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/articles/starting-values.html)

## Authors & Contacts

Please read the
[FAQ](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/articles/FAQ.html)
before contacting authors

- Marie-Laure Delignette-Muller:
  `marielaure.delignettemuller<<@))vetagro-sup.fr`
- Christophe Dutang: `dutangc<<@))gmail.com`
- Aurélie Siberchicot: `aurelie.siberchicot<<@))univ-lyon1.fr`

Issues can be reported on
[fitdistrplus-issues](https://github.com/lbbe-software/fitdistrplus/issues).

## Citation

If you use `fitdistrplus`, you should cite:  
Marie Laure Delignette-Muller, Christophe Dutang (2015). *fitdistrplus:
An R Package for Fitting Distributions.* Journal of Statistical
Software.
[https://www.jstatsoft.org/article/view/v064i04](https://www.jstatsoft.org/article/view/v064i04)
DOI [10.18637/jss.v064.i04](https://doi.org/10.18637/jss.v064.i04).

# Package index

## Overview

Overview of `fitdistrplus`

- [`fitdistrplus`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/fitdistrplus.md)
  [`fitdistrplus-package`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/fitdistrplus.md)
  :

  Overview of the fitdistrplus package

## Exploratory analysis

Exploratory analysis when searching for appropriate distributions

- [`descdist()`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/descdist.md)
  [`print(`*`<descdist>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/descdist.md)
  : Description of an empirical distribution for non-censored data

## Fit uncensored distributions

Fitting procedures and derivatives

- [`fitdist()`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/fitdist.md)
  [`print(`*`<fitdist>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/fitdist.md)
  [`plot(`*`<fitdist>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/fitdist.md)
  [`summary(`*`<fitdist>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/fitdist.md)
  [`logLik(`*`<fitdist>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/fitdist.md)
  [`AIC(`*`<fitdist>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/fitdist.md)
  [`BIC(`*`<fitdist>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/fitdist.md)
  [`vcov(`*`<fitdist>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/fitdist.md)
  [`coef(`*`<fitdist>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/fitdist.md)
  : Fit of univariate distributions to non-censored data
- [`quantile(`*`<fitdist>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/quantile.md)
  [`quantile(`*`<fitdistcens>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/quantile.md)
  [`quantile(`*`<bootdist>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/quantile.md)
  [`quantile(`*`<bootdistcens>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/quantile.md)
  [`print(`*`<quantile.fitdist>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/quantile.md)
  [`print(`*`<quantile.fitdistcens>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/quantile.md)
  [`print(`*`<quantile.bootdist>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/quantile.md)
  [`print(`*`<quantile.bootdistcens>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/quantile.md)
  : Quantile estimation from a fitted distribution
- [`gofstat()`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/gofstat.md)
  [`print(`*`<gofstat.fitdist>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/gofstat.md)
  [`print(`*`<gofstat.fitdistcens>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/gofstat.md)
  : Goodness-of-fit statistics
- [`mgedist()`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/mgedist.md)
  : Maximum goodness-of-fit fit of univariate continuous distributions
- [`mledist()`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/mledist.md)
  : Maximum likelihood fit of univariate distributions
- [`mmedist()`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/mmedist.md)
  : Matching moment fit of univariate distributions
- [`msedist()`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/msedist.md)
  : Maximum spacing estimation of univariate distributions
- [`qmedist()`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/qmedist.md)
  : Quantile matching fit of univariate distributions
- [`bootdist()`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/bootdist.md)
  [`print(`*`<bootdist>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/bootdist.md)
  [`plot(`*`<bootdist>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/bootdist.md)
  [`summary(`*`<bootdist>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/bootdist.md)
  [`density(`*`<bootdist>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/bootdist.md)
  [`plot(`*`<density.bootdist>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/bootdist.md)
  [`print(`*`<density.bootdist>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/bootdist.md)
  : Bootstrap simulation of uncertainty for non-censored data

## Fit censored distributions

Fitting procedures and derivatives

- [`fitdistcens()`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/fitdistcens.md)
  [`print(`*`<fitdistcens>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/fitdistcens.md)
  [`plot(`*`<fitdistcens>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/fitdistcens.md)
  [`summary(`*`<fitdistcens>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/fitdistcens.md)
  [`logLik(`*`<fitdistcens>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/fitdistcens.md)
  [`AIC(`*`<fitdistcens>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/fitdistcens.md)
  [`BIC(`*`<fitdistcens>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/fitdistcens.md)
  [`vcov(`*`<fitdistcens>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/fitdistcens.md)
  [`coef(`*`<fitdistcens>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/fitdistcens.md)
  : Fitting of univariate distributions to censored data
- [`quantile(`*`<fitdist>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/quantile.md)
  [`quantile(`*`<fitdistcens>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/quantile.md)
  [`quantile(`*`<bootdist>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/quantile.md)
  [`quantile(`*`<bootdistcens>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/quantile.md)
  [`print(`*`<quantile.fitdist>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/quantile.md)
  [`print(`*`<quantile.fitdistcens>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/quantile.md)
  [`print(`*`<quantile.bootdist>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/quantile.md)
  [`print(`*`<quantile.bootdistcens>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/quantile.md)
  : Quantile estimation from a fitted distribution
- [`gofstat()`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/gofstat.md)
  [`print(`*`<gofstat.fitdist>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/gofstat.md)
  [`print(`*`<gofstat.fitdistcens>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/gofstat.md)
  : Goodness-of-fit statistics
- [`mledist()`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/mledist.md)
  : Maximum likelihood fit of univariate distributions
- [`Surv2fitdistcens()`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/Surv2fitdistcens.md)
  : Handling of data formated as in the survival package for use in
  fitdistcens()
- [`bootdistcens()`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/bootdistcens.md)
  [`print(`*`<bootdistcens>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/bootdistcens.md)
  [`plot(`*`<bootdistcens>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/bootdistcens.md)
  [`summary(`*`<bootdistcens>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/bootdistcens.md)
  [`density(`*`<bootdistcens>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/bootdistcens.md)
  [`plot(`*`<density.bootdistcens>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/bootdistcens.md)
  [`print(`*`<density.bootdistcens>`*`)`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/bootdistcens.md)
  : Bootstrap simulation of uncertainty for censored data

## Graphics

Graphical procedures

- [`CIcdfplot()`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/CIcdfplot.md)
  : Empirical cumulative distribution function with pointwise confidence
  intervals on probabilities or on quantiles
- [`plotdist()`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/plotdist.md)
  : Plot of empirical and theoretical distributions for non-censored
  data
- [`plotdistcens()`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/plotdistcens.md)
  : Plot of empirical and theoretical distributions for censored data
- [`cdfcomp()`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/graphcomp.md)
  [`denscomp()`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/graphcomp.md)
  [`qqcomp()`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/graphcomp.md)
  [`ppcomp()`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/graphcomp.md)
  : Graphical comparison of multiple fitted distributions (for
  non-censored data)
- [`cdfcompcens()`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/graphcompcens.md)
  [`qqcompcens()`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/graphcompcens.md)
  [`ppcompcens()`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/graphcompcens.md)
  : Graphical comparison of multiple fitted distributions for censored
  data

## Data

Useful datasets

- [`danishuni`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/danish.md)
  [`danishmulti`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/danish.md)
  : Danish reinsurance claim dataset
- [`dataFAQlog1`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/dataFAQ.md)
  [`dataFAQscale1`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/dataFAQ.md)
  [`dataFAQscale2`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/dataFAQ.md)
  : Datasets for the FAQ
- [`endosulfan`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/endosulfan.md)
  : Species Sensitivity Distribution (SSD) for endosulfan
- [`fluazinam`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/fluazinam.md)
  : Species-Sensitivity Distribution (SSD) for Fluazinam
- [`fremale`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/fremale.md)
  : Fictive survival dataset of a french Male population
- [`groundbeef`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/groundbeef.md)
  : Ground beef serving size data set
- [`salinity`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/salinity.md)
  : Species-Sensitivity Distribution (SSD) for salinity tolerance
- [`smokedfish`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/smokedfish.md)
  : Contamination data of Listeria monocytogenes in smoked fish
- [`toxocara`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/toxocara.md)
  : Parasite abundance in insular feral cats

## Misc

Other internal functions

- [`detectbound()`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/detectbound.md)
  : Detect bounds for density function
- [`llplot()`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/logLik-plot.md)
  : (Log)likelihood plot for a fit using maximum likelihood
- [`llsurface()`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/logLik-surface.md)
  [`llcurve()`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/logLik-surface.md)
  : (Log)likelihood surfaces or (log)likelihood curves
- [`prefit()`](https://lbbe-software.github.io/fitdistrplus/reference/prefit.md)
  : Pre-fitting procedure
